attributes.action: Make organ donation opt out rather than opt in with more education on donation
attributes.additional_details:
Many points outlined at the following website 

https://www.nhsbt.nhs.uk/get-involved/promoting-donation-hub/key-messages-and-information/organ-donation-conversation/

http://www.who.int/bulletin/volumes/93/3/14-139535/en/
attributes.background: As of right now, the UK has a system in place where a person must opt into organ donation with a lack of education on how to donate organs after passing. I'm suggesting a change to which we follow a similar system to Spain in which a person must explicitly opt out of the organ donation register
